decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This consent is valid for a period of two years and does not authorise any works carried out beyond that period.
Reason: In accordance with the Town and Country Planning (Tree Preservation) (England) Regulations 2012.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
TPO 10/1996 TPO details in maps...
T4 Fig Tree: Raise canopy to 2.5m over footpath. Remove dead branches >2.5cm diameter. Retain low branches for seclusion. T3 Lime: Thin regrowth by 10% to reduce branch density and improve wind passage, lowering branch failure risk. Reduce branches over garden by 2m to growth points. Raise canopy to 2.5m over path, 5.5m over road. Retain low branches for seclusion. T2 Lime Tree: Thin regrowth by 10% for reduced branch density and wind passage. Reduce branches over garden by 2m to growth points. Raise canopy to 2.5m over path, 5.5m over road. Remove dead branches >2.5cm diameter. Retain low branches. T19 Lime Tree: Thin regrowth by 10% to improve wind passage. Raise canopy to 2.5m over path, 5.5m over road. Remove dead branches >2.5cm diameter. Retain low branches for seclusion. T15 Lime: Thin regrowth by 10% for reduced branch density and wind passage. Reduce branches over garden by 2m to growth points. Raise canopy to 2.5m over path, 5.5m over road. Remove dead branches >2.5cm diameter. Retain low branches for seclusion. T14 London Plane: Reduce height and crown spread by 2-2.5m to growth points. Reduce branches over garden by 2m to growth points. Raise canopy to 2.5m over path, 5.5m over road. Remove dead branches >2.5cm diameter. T13 London Plane: Reduce height and crown spread by 2-2.5m to growth points. Raise canopy to 2.5m over path, 5.5m over road. Reduce branches over garden by 2m to growth points. Remove dead branches >2.5cm diameter. Retain low branches for seclusion. T12 Lime Tree: Thin regrowth by 10% for reduced branch density and improved wind passage. Raise canopy to 2.5m over path, 5.5m over road. Remove dead branches >2.5cm diameter. Retain low branches for seclusion. T11 Lime Tree: Reduce branches towards 39 Albert Bridge Road, clearing roof and elevation by 2-2.5m, retaining growth points. Thin regrowth by 10% for reduced branch density and wind passage. Reduce branches over garden by 2m to growth points. Raise
